column5: I have just downloaded it, and ran an AVG virus/Shell extension scan on it and it checked out as being ok and virus free,  but I have yet to try it.. http://www.kalassa.net/propilkki2/index.php?id=1&eng=1
Hot dang...that sounds like fun!  I don't want to risk downloading it to the computer at work though
You were able to get it in English?
why can't I get it in english I keep getting it in finish
Same here. I clicked English, the only word in English is "ok" I downloaded from the first 2 "here". Maybe 3rd times a charm
Works for me as well. Uploaded game and installed it. Caught two perch 30 and 35g lol
how long did it take for you to catch something? I can't get nothing...lol

Amazing game clampit !!!! thanks,i did practice & game,i cant catch anything,i have changed lures,and walked to lots of different spots,but its almost real,the graphics are great !!! i tries spoons & wigglers,and drilled 15 holes.....
I caught two perch after i figured out how to full the fish out. Went into a tourney and played for 15 minutes and didn't catch anything.
For those that are having issues with the Language.  on the Main Menu screen, click on ASETUKSET  at the top of the next screen, click on ENGLANTI   That should solve your problem   ENJOY!!!
First 15 min. tourney cought 4 Greyling. Biggest 360g
HOW DO YOU CATCH FISH !!!!!...lol..lol.  . now i know why i hate ice fishing !!!.  ...but at least im warm & cozy at home with a rum & coke in my hand !!!!
still can't get it in english but tried it any way and got like 5 fish on the green mogot
I cant seem to catch anything???.  ...i wont give up though...
It's just like the real thing!

In prectice mode, I walked out and setup between 2 islands.  In 10 min, I've got 9 perch with the 2 biggest being 377g and 328g   Way too much fun, My wife doesn't seem to be too thrilled with the fact I can fish from home as well
I just downloaded and played the game in practice mode. Didn't catch anything but all i did was chose english and it is in english i guess i got lucky.
I packed the sleigh and I'm a headin' her out!

Well I got back, and placed 6th. I caught 4 Perch, and another one of those Roach's. They really got the sound effects down perty good, what with the coughing, spitting, and rubbing of the hands together.  If you do not get any bites fer a bit, the character actually starts yawning!  Also you can hear crows, and the realistic sound of the wind blowing. I also noticed, that if you change spots a lot, and have yer character cover a lot of distance by prolonged running, he tires out and slows to a walk!  I was fishing a river system, and discovered this.
Nice! I'm in the midst of downloading this right now. Sounds like fun. Mind you, I already waste a truckload of time on my current obsession....playing Fish Wrangler on Facebook!

it's something to do until the real thing happens, played an hour tourney on some huge bay  and got 51dink perch 30 ruffe 2 pike 10 roach and 1 zander, it awsome how they came out with this for this year, exspecially the realistic sounds except gas lol cheers.
Is it just me, or does this thing load ridiculously slow? I don't get it...my computer is normally really fast.

Cool game when your stuck indoors. Caught a ton of fish. Perch, Bream, Ruff, Rudd, 1 white fish, few Artic Graylings. No pike yet or laker.  Its great cause you can even adjust the sensitivity of the rod tip.  DSN
